Detailed Description

tMultiRadarClient callback interface for observing changes to the list of available radars

Definition at line 23 of file MultiRadarClient.h.

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum Navico::Protocol::iRadarListObserver::eAction
Enumerator
Added 

A new radar has been added.

Removed 

An existing radar is being removed (only happens when ClearRadars is invoked)

Changed 

The address of an existing radar has changed (may need to reconnect)
